All Gale Approval Down Choices

Join Lae'zel against the tieflings if you persuade them to free her. Smear dung on your face when Sentinel Olak asks you to. Read the Necromancer Tome from Search the Cellar. Agree to open the gate for the goblin raiders.

Gale BG3 Romance Guide

Where to find Gale in Baldur's Gate 3?

Players can find Gale right after the prologue, at the Roadside Cliffs waypoint located just above the Nautilus shipwreck. To learn more about Gale, please vi
